pl.bristleback.server.bristle.serialization.system.json.extractor

Interface ValueSerializer<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FormattingValueSerializer<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseNumberFormattingValueSerializer, BaseRawValueSerializer, BigDecimalValueSerializer, BigIntegerValueSerializer, BooleanValueSerializer, CharacterValueSerializer, DateValueSerializer, DoubleValueSerializer, EnumSerializer, IntegerValueSerializer, LongValueSerializer, StringValueSerializer

    public interface ValueSerializer<T>
    Implementations of this interface should be capable of converting data stored as json into some specified Java objects and from Java objects into json form. Standard Bristleback serialization engine contains several built in implementations for the most fundamental Java types (numbers, String variables, dates, boolean variables, enums, etc).

    Created on: 2011-07-26 13:22:02

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
    See Also:
    FormattingValueSerializer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(BristlebackConfig configuration)
      This method can be implemented if Bristleback configuration object is somehow used by the value serializer implementation.
      String toText(T value, PropertySerialization information)
      Serializes Java object as a Json text.
      T toValue(JsonTokenizer tokenizer, PropertySerialization information)
      Converts json value stored as text into Java object.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(BristlebackConfig configuration)
        This method can be implemented if Bristleback configuration object is somehow used by the value serializer implementation.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Bristleback configuration.

      • toValue

        T toValue(JsonTokenizer tokenizer,
        PropertySerialization information)
          throws Exception
        Converts json value stored as text into Java object.
        Parameters:
        tokenizer - tokenizer is used to retrieve simple or complex json tokens from text.
        information - serialization information, containing constraints, format information, children properties access objects, etc.
        Returns:
        deserialized Java object.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any exception occurs during the deserialization process.

      • toText

        String toText(T value,
            PropertySerialization information)
              throws Exception
        Serializes Java object as a Json text.
        Parameters:
        value - value to serialize.
        information - serialization information, containing constraints, format information, children properties access objects, etc.
        Returns:
        value stored as a Json text value.
        Throws:
        Exception
